name: CubeAttack
description:
Cubes come to kill you, You can cut them in half, using your saber.

Theres a spawn chance of Shooting enemies too.

You can deflect blaster fire, with the saber.

Theres 4 difficulties

* Easy

* Normal

* Hard

* Expert

Difficulties add more speed to enemies and blaster fire.

Its a fun game but is target star wars fans and/or new vr users.

The game itself is like a tower Defense game.

DOWNLOADS:

You can get a Standalone VR experience or download a Windows version.

This game isnt 100% done, but theres no gameplay bugs, only some visual effects i would like improved and maybe some better bullet stuff, but thats in the works rn.

This game can be played Seated and standing

Some Features are official star wars material, such as music.

Credits in-game.
